div.p: 3 weeks 2 days ago

I want everyone to be aware that Easter Break is coming up next week and we will honor the vacation for our kitchen staffs. That means NO Lunches on Thursday the 9th or Friday the 10th. Lunches will resume on Monday the 13th. I hope everyone is well and stays that way. #NFVstrong

I want everyone to be aware that Easter Break is coming up next week and we will honor the vacation for our kitchen staffs. That means NO Lunches on Thursday the 9th or Friday the 10th. Lunches will resume on Monday the 13th. I hope everyone is well and stays that way. #NFVstrong

div.p: 1 month 1 week ago
[[SUBJECT]] [[SHORT_URL]]

p.a: Communication to parents on student learning

div.p: This can be a stressful time for our youth. Our plan at North Fayette Valley is to encourage teachers to regularly reach out to students. We believe it is important for teachers to continue serving as a caring adult in the lives of their students. At this time we are not able to provide educational....

div.class: efbl_fb_story efbl_ver_free fullwidth mobile_status_update efbl_no_image efbl_

div.p: 1 month 1 week ago

Communication to parents on student learning:
This can be a stressful time for our youth. Our plan at North Fayette Valley is to encourage teachers to regularly reach out to students. We believe it is important for teachers to continue serving as a caring adult in the lives of their students. At this time we are not able to provide educational services to parents/students due to potential legal issues surrounding equity and IEP/504 accommodations not being met. As we continue to receive guidance in these uncharted territories, we will keep you informed and aim to offer the best resources we can.

So basically because some parents don't want to help dedicate personal time to ensure and enforce their child/children's learning then the rest of the children dont get to stick to the curriculum..? Guess we will be looking up other learning options for the month.

div.p: 1 month 1 week ago
School will be closed for 30 days. Certified Staff Cooks, and Associates do not have to report. watch for further announcements this week
School will be closed for 30 days. Certified Staff Cooks, and Associates do not have to report. watch for further announcements this week
Please let us know about curriculum ideas and how we can help minimize their need to make up days going into summer.

div.p: 1 month 1 week ago
Following the Governor's recommendation school will be closed for 30. Certified Staff Cooks, and Associates do not have to report.
Following the Governor's recommendation school will be closed for 30. Certified Staff Cooks, and Associates do not have to report.
Just got the text confirming, it is in fact 30 days.
30 days for until the 30th?
2 - 1 month 1 week ago
?? Same as the question above... thanks for clarification.
Not 30 days right. Just till the end of the month?

It is the policy of the North Fayette Valley Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district’s Equity Coordinator, Duane Willhite, Superintendent 600 N. Pine St., 563-422-3852, dwillhite@nfv.k12.ia.us or Director of the Office for Civil Rights U.S. Department of Education, Citigroup Center, 500 W. Madison Street, Suite 1475, Chicago, IL 60661-7204, Telephone: 312-730-1560 Facsimile: 312-730-1576, Email: OCR.Chicago@ed.gov
